docs.title: Quan Yuan (袁泉)
docs.text: Associate Professor & Ph.D. Supervisor Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT) 10 Xitucheng Road, Beijing, China E-mail: yuanquan AT bupt DOT edu DOT cn

docs.title: About me
docs.text: I received Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology from BUPT. I am currently an associate professor at the State Key Laboratory of Networking and Switching Technology, BUPT. My research interest focuses on cooperative perception, communication and computing for AI-empowered machines (e.g., autonomous vehicles, UAVs, and industrial robots).

docs.title: Biography
docs.text: Quan Yuan (Member, IEEE) received the Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT), Beijing, China, in 2018. He is currently an Associate Professor with the State Key Laboratory of Networking and Switching Technology, BUPT. He serves as the Associate Editor of the IEEE Internet of Things Journal. His current research interests focuses on cooperative perception, communication and computing for AI-empowered machines.
